channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Welcome <3
item.description: Hello! Welcome to my site. I will be showcasing the things that I’ve done. School Projects Here are some projects I’ve worked on during my time at school: Project 1: A description of what I did. Project 2: Something cool I learned while doing this project. Interests I’m passionate about: Programming languages (especially OCaml and Python) Web development (using Hugo and GitHub Pages) AI and diffusion models Music and sound analysis Contact Feel free to reach out via email@example.
